job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongPOSITION PURPOSEbrbrstrongThe Software Engineer is responsible for joining a product team and contributing to the software design software development and overall product lifecycle for a product that our users love The engineering process is highly collaborative Software Engineers are expected to pair on a daily basis as they work through user stories and support products as they evolvebrbrIn addition Software Engineers may be involved in product configuration performance tuning and testing as well as production monitoringbrbrAs a Software Engineer you will be part of a team with more experienced engineers to help build and grow your skills while you create support and deploy production applicationsbrbrstronguMajor Tasks Responsibilities And Key Accountabilitiesbrbrustrongstrong60  Delivery amp ExecutionbrbrstrongCollaborates and pairs with other product team members UX engineering and product management to create secure reliable scalable software solutionsbrbrWorks with Product Team to ensure user stories that are developerready easy to understand and testablebrbrWrites custom code or scripts to automate infrastructure monitoring services and test casesbrbrWrites custom code or scripts to do destructive testing to ensure adequate resiliency in productionbrbrConfigures commercial off the shelf solutions to align with evolving business needsbrbrCreates meaningful dashboards logging alerting and responses to ensure that issues are captured and addressed proactivelybrbrstrong20  Support amp EnablementbrbrstrongFields questions from other product teams or support teamsbrbrMonitors tools and participates in conversations to encourage collaboration across product teamsbrbrProvides application support for software running in productionbrbrProactively monitors production Service Level Objectives for productsbrbrProactively reviews the Performance and Capacity of all aspects of production code infrastructure data and message processingbrbrstrong20 LearningbrbrstrongParticipates in learning activities around modern software design and development core practices communities of practicebrbrProactively views articles tutorials and videos to learn about new technologies and best practices being used within other technology organizationsbrbrReviews and discusses code from more senior engineers to understand best practices and design patternsbrbrIncreases business acumen by learning about other parts of the businessbrbrstrong NATURE AND SCOPEbrbrstrongTypically reports to the Software Engineer Manager or Sr ManagerbrbrstronguEnvironmentbrbrustrongstrong ENVIRONMENTAL JOB REQUIREMENTSbrbrstrongLocated in a comfortable indoor area Any unpleasant conditions would be infrequent and not objectionablebrbrstronguTravelbrbrustrongTypically requires overnight travel less than 10 of the timebrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongMust be eighteen years of age or olderbrbrMust be legally permitted to work in the United StatesbrbrstronguAdditional Minimum QualificationsbrbrustrongExperience in an object oriented programming language preferably JavabrbrstronguEducation RequiredbrbrustrongThe knowledge skills and abilities typically acquired through the completion of a high school diploma andor GEDbrbrstrong Years of Relevant Work Experience strong01 yearbrbrstronguPhysical RequirementsbrbrustrongMost of the time is spent sitting in a comfortable position and there is frequent opportunity to move about On rare occasions there may be a need to move or lift light articlesbrbrstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrbrustrongulli01 years of relevant work experienceliliExperience in a scripting language Python or Linux ShellliliExperience in an object oriented programming language JavaliliExposure to a modern web application framework such as Spring MVC and NodejsliliExposure to a frontend technology and framework such as HTML CSS JavaScript AngularJS ReactJS and JQueryliliExposure to writing SQL queries against a relational databaseliliExposure to version control systems GitliliCompletion of a coding bootcamp or post high school educationliliTechnical Tools Intellij Eclipse GitHub Jenkins Jira SwaggerliulstrongKnowledge Skills Abilities and CompetenciesbrstrongulliCultivates Innovation Creating new and better ways for the organization to be successfulliliCollaborates Building partnerships and working collaboratively with others to meet shared objectivesliliCommunicates Effectively Developing and delivering multimode communications that convey a clear understanding of the unique needs of different audiencesliliDrives Results Consistently achieving results even under tough circumstancesliliGlobal Perspective Taking a broad view when approaching issues using a global lensliliInterpersonal Savvy Relating openly and comfortably with diverse groups of peopleliliManages Ambiguity Operating effectively even when things are not certain or the way forward is not clearliliNimble Learning Actively learning through experimentation when tackling new problems using both successes and failures as learning fodderliliSelfDevelopment Actively seeking new ways to grow and be challenged using both formal and informal development channelsliliSituational Adaptability Adapting approach and demeanor in real time to match the shifting demands of different situationsliul
